meanings.sent1: The storm created the roiliest sea I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The roiliest part of the river was where the rapids began.
meanings.sent3: Trying to organize my room during a party was the roiliest task.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like the roiliest ocean, constantly changing and unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The roiliest roller coaster in the amusement park made my stomach churn.

meanings.definition: In a state of confusion or disorder.
meanings.sent1: The roiliest classroom I've ever been in had papers scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent2: After the earthquake, the town was in the roiliest state of chaos.
meanings.sent3: Trying to follow the roiliest recipe without measurements was a disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were the roiliest jumble, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The roiliest traffic jam I encountered was a nightmare to navigate.
